-- | Exception monad transformer instances for monads-tf classes.
--   
@package exception-monads-tf
@version 0.4


module Control.Monad.Exception.Instances
instance MonadWriter m => MonadWriter (ExceptionT m)
instance MonadState m => MonadState (ExceptionT m)
instance MonadReader m => MonadReader (ExceptionT m)
instance MonadRWS m => MonadRWS (ExceptionT m)
instance MonadCont m => MonadCont (ExceptionT m)
